metadata.title: CVE-2023-50782 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the python-cryptography package. This issue may allow aremote attacker to decrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSAkey exchanges, which may lead to exposure of confidential or sensitivedata.

criterions.comment: python-cryptography: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openssl package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
openssl1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
